channel.title: Projects on Anshuman Tiwari
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Anshuman Tiwari

item.title: Project 1: Image Segmentation with Pytorch
item.description: In this project, I embarked on a captivating journey to explore the fascinating world of image segmentation. By diving deep into the segmentation dataset, I gained a comprehensive understanding of its intricacies and nuances. To facilitate seamless integration, I developed a custom dataset class specifically tailored for the image-mask dataset, enabling efficient data handling and processing. To enhance the dataset further, I harnessed the power of segmentation augmentation techniques using the Albumentations library.

item.title: Project 2: Visualizing the filters of a CNN
item.description: During this captivating guided project, I delved into the world of Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) and uncovered the mesmerizing artistry hidden within. Using the renowned VGG16 model, I embarked on a mission to visualize the diverse filters spanning across its layers. Through the power of TensorFlow and the gradient ascent algorithm, I unlocked the secrets behind image activation and brought forth stunning visual representations. Working on this project has been an eye-opening experience.

item.title: Project 3: Transfer Learning for Image Classification
item.description: Throughout this captivating hands-on project, I ventured into the realm of deep learning, specifically exploring the incredible concept of transfer learning. Join me as I recount my journey, where I trained a classification model to predict food types, igniting a spark of innovation within the food industry. This project has been an exhilarating learning experience for me. From the very beginning, I was captivated by the challenges presented in understanding the problem statement and acquainting myself with the dataset.

item.title: Project 4: Hyperparameter tuning with NNI
item.description: Join me on an intriguing deep learning adventure as we delve into the realm of hyperparameter tuning using Microsoft’s Neural Network Intelligence (NNI) toolkit. In this project project, I explored the capabilities of NNI, a powerful AutoML toolkit designed to automate various aspects of machine learning. Throughout this project, I delved into the fascinating world of hyperparameter tuning using NNI. Embracing the power of this open-source toolkit, created by Microsoft, I harnessed its capabilities to automate feature engineering, hyperparameter tuning, neural architecture search, and model compression.

item.title: Project 5: Understanding the Explainabale AI
item.description: Welcome to my captivating world of deep learning, where I embarked on an extraordinary project focused on the realm of explainable AI. Throughout this hands-on endeavor, I delved into the intricacies of Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs), Residual Blocks, and the fascinating technique known as Grad-CAM. With a vision to detect the type of scenery in satellite images, I trained a deep learning model that combines the power of CNNs and Residual Blocks.
